skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Developed and maintained dynamic web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Utilized React Framework to streamline development and enhance code maintainability.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Designed, developed, and maintained server-side components. Implemented RESTful APIs and microservices architecture for seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Developed wireframes, interactive prototypes, and design mockups to communicate design concepts effectively to cross-functional teams. Collaborated closely with developers to ensure seamless implementation of design elements.
